mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_bbs WHERE b_writer= #{b_writer} ORDER BY b_date DESC, b_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_bbs( b_seq, b_date, b_time, b_writer, b_subject, b_content, b_addr ) VALUES( #{b_seq}, #{b_date}, #{b_time}, #{b_writer}, #{b_subject}, #{b_content}, #{b_addr} )
mapper.select: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tbl_bbs ( b_seq BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, b_date VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, b_time VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, b_writer VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, b_addr VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, b_subject VARCHAR(125) NOT NULL, b_content VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL )
